survey_name: Electric Scooter Sharing Service Feedback Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather user feedback on the electric scooter sharing service to improve usability, safety, and overall customer satisfaction.

questions.question_text: How often do you use our electric scooter sharing service?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for clarity. Ensure options cover all frequency ranges.

script.question_text: How often do you use our electric scooter sharing service?

questions.question_text: What is your primary reason for using our electric scooter sharing service?
questions.client_notes: Include an 'Other' option with a text field for additional responses.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: SINGLE_CHOICE with optional open-text follow-up for 'Other'

script.question_text: What is your primary reason for using our electric scooter sharing service?

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the availability of scooters in your area?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for consistency. Ensure mobile-friendly display.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the availability of scooters in your area?

questions.question_text: What safety features would you like to see improved or added to our scooters? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Allow multiple selections. Include an 'Other' option with a text field.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: MULTI_CHOICE (checkboxes) with optional open-text follow-up for 'Other'

script.question_text: What safety features would you like to see improved or added to our scooters? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: Please share any additional comments or suggestions to improve our electric scooter sharing service.
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative feedback. Limit response length to 500 characters.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: OPEN_TEXT (text area with character limit)

script.question_text: Please share any additional comments or suggestions to improve our electric scooter sharing service.
